languages.text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.
languages.original_text: В одном бою архмилитант может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g}, и героический акт {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдата{/g}. Примечание: героический акт или отчаянные меры по-прежнему можно использовать только один раз за раунд.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran can use both the heroic act of the Veteran doctrine and the heroic act of the Fighter or Marksman doctrine in one combat.

The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.

languages.text: 在同一场战斗中，首席战士既可以使用首席战士{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，又可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}士兵{/g}职业的英雄壮举。 注意：您每轮中只能使用一次英雄壮举或背水一战。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: 在同一场战斗中，首席战士既可以使用首席战士{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，又可以使用{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}士兵{/g}职业的英雄壮举。 注意：您每轮中只能使用一次英雄壮举或背水一战。

languages.text: El Archimilitante puede usar tanto el {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} Archimilitante como el acto heroico del arquetipo {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldado{/g} en un mismo combate. Nota: Solo puedes usar un acto heroico o una medida desesperada por asalto.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: El Archimilitante puede usar tanto el {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} Archimilitante como el acto heroico del arquetipo {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldado{/g} en un mismo combate. Nota: Solo puedes usar un acto heroico o una medida desesperada por asalto.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントが1回の戦闘において、アーク・ミリタント{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}兵士{/g}による英雄的行為の両方を使用することができる。 注：英雄的行為や非常手段は相変わらずラウンドにつき一回のみ使用できる。
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: アーク・ミリタントが1回の戦闘において、アーク・ミリタント{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}兵士{/g}による英雄的行為の両方を使用することができる。 注：英雄的行為や非常手段は相変わらずラウンドにつき一回のみ使用できる。
アーク・ミリタントが1回の戦闘において、アーク・ミリタント{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}と、ファイターまたは兵士による{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}英雄的行為{/g}の両方を使用することができる。

languages.text: В одном бою архмилитант может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g}, и героический акт {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}солдата{/g}. Примечание: героический акт или отчаянные меры по-прежнему можно использовать только один раз за раунд.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: В одном бою ветеран может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своей {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g}, и героический акт бойца или стрелка.
В одном бою ветеран может совершить и {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} своей {g|Encyclopedia:Career}доктрины{/g}, и героический акт бойца или стрелка.

languages.text: Der Erzmilitant kann in einem Kampf die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} seines {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} und die Heldentat der Archetypen {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldat{/g} einsetzen. Hinweis: Du kannst eine Helden- oder Verzweiflungstat weiterhin nur einmal pro Runde einsetzen.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: Der Erzmilitant kann in einem Kampf die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} seines {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} und die Heldentat der Archetypen {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldat{/g} einsetzen. Hinweis: Du kannst eine Helden- oder Verzweiflungstat weiterhin nur einmal pro Runde einsetzen.

languages.text: L'archimilitant peut utiliser à la fois l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} de l'archimilitant et l'acte héroïque de l'archétype du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} ou du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldat{/g} au cours d'un même combat. Remarque : Vous ne pouvez toujours effectuer qu'un seul acte héroïque ou mesure désespérée par round.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: L'archimilitant peut utiliser à la fois l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} de l'archimilitant et l'acte héroïque de l'archétype du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} ou du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}soldat{/g} au cours d'un même combat. Remarque : Vous ne pouvez toujours effectuer qu'un seul acte héroïque ou mesure désespérée par round.

languages.text: Başmilitan, hem Başmilitan {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemini{/g} hem de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Asker{/g} arketipinin kahramanca eylemini tek bir çatışma içinde gerçekleştirebilir. Not: Hâlâ her turda bir kez kahramanca eylem veya son çare önlem kullanabilirsin.
languages.original_text: The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat. Note: You can still only use a heroic act or desperate measures once per round.

traits.locale_text: Başmilitan, hem Başmilitan {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemini{/g} hem de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Asker{/g} arketipinin kahramanca eylemini tek bir çatışma içinde gerçekleştirebilir. Not: Hâlâ her turda bir kez kahramanca eylem veya son çare önlem kullanabilirsin.

languages.text:
The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.
<i>Note! You can still use only one {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} per round!<i>

The Arch-Militant can use both the {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} of the Arch-Militant {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} and the heroic act of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerMarksmanGlossary}Soldier{/g} archetype in a single combat.
<i>Note! You can still use only one {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} per round!<i>
